name: ROB.O.T.S.
description:
ROB.O.T.S. (Rob On the Spot) is a 2D rogue-lite shooter featuring a cute and innocent Robot called ROB and its team of friendly and not dangerous minions.

              

Tired of being used as a lab rat, ROB decides to escape the HQ in which it was created, but to reach this goal, it will need to face many different obstacles (including evil scientists, bullets going everywhere, and more!).
But don't be afraid! While moving on, you will be able to collect scraps to upgrade ROB and its minions, and in a matter of few (we hope) matches, you will be in control of an unstoppable death squad!



Movement  //  WASD
Aim  //  Mouse
Shoot  //  Left click
